<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add User Profile V2</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v2/user"}></MethodEndpoint>



Adds a new administrative user. Supports multiple roles for a single user.

## Request

Model containing user profile

Maximum length is 300 characters.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"lastName"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Last name.  Maximum length is 300 characters.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"roleIds"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Role IDs","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"timeZone"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Time zone (e.g. America/Los_Angeles)","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
